name: SKBs-Mission
summary:
In the Red Side you play as Crimson, a Succubus Agent with insatiable desires who gets powers from sex. In the Blue Side, you'll play as Blue Whale, a serious Incubus agent with the biggest dick of the ARMY.

Their mission is to stop Chastity, an order that wants to put an end to all form of desire. Corrupt the enemy's captains by their sexual desires and makes them join you in this fight!
